name: TASK_INFO
description: This table displays general information about the Task Templates (LTT) record.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task template record.

columns.name: RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the task template record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the task template record.
